headline: Regions Financial Corporation Declares Quarterly Common and Preferred Stock Dividends
summary: BIRMINGHAM, Ala., April 16, 2025--Regions Financial Corporation (NYSE:RF) today declared cash dividends on its common shares, as well as Series C, D, E and F preferred shares.
